Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2018 11:25AM wyngaardt wrote: These are all amazing stories and give me alot of hope for my wife. We are waiting on a CT scan to determine what stage she is on. She initatially had Stage 3 Breast Cancer, it has not spread to her neck, chest wall and arm pits. Can this be regarded as Mets?
